articles.title: Om Raut reacts to criticism around portrayal of Ravana in Adipurush: 'We have not done anything wrong…' - The Indian Express
articles.description: Adipurush has faced a lot of criticism for misrepresenting Lord Ram, Sita, Ravana and Hanuman. The film stars Prabhas, Kriti Sanon and Saif Ali Khan in the lead roles.
